languages.text: At the end of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}collision{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} inflicted by the wearer this turn.

traits.locale_text: At the end of the wearer's turn, they gain temporary wounds equal to the amount of collision damage inflicted by the wearer this turn.

At the end of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the amount of collision {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} inflicted by the wearer this turn.

languages.text: 装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，获得额外临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于装备者本回合造成的碰撞{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: At the end of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the amount of collision {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} inflicted by the wearer this turn.

traits.locale_text: 装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，获得额外临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于装备者本回合造成的碰撞伤害。

languages.text: В конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж получает временное {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, равное значению {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}столкновений{/g}, который он нанес в этом ходу.
languages.original_text: At the end of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}collision{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} inflicted by the wearer this turn.

traits.locale_text: В конце своего хода персонаж получает временное здоровье, равное значению урона от столкновений, который он нанес в этом ходу.
В конце своего хода персонаж получает временное здоровье, равное значению урона от столкновений, который он нанес в этом ходу.

languages.text: 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時、このターンで使用者が受けた衝突{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}量と同等の一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: At the end of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the amount of collision {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} inflicted by the wearer this turn.

traits.locale_text: 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時、このターンで使用者が受けた衝突ダメージ量と同等の一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Cuando el portador termina su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, consigue la cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} equivalente al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de colisión infligido por el portador durante el mismo turno.
languages.original_text: At the end of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the amount of collision {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} inflicted by the wearer this turn.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador termina su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, consigue la cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} equivalente al daño de colisión infligido por el portador durante el mismo turno.

languages.text: Am Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Trägers erhält er temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} entsprechend der Menge des vom Träger in dieser Runde verursachten {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Kollisionsschadens{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the end of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the amount of collision {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} inflicted by the wearer this turn.

traits.locale_text: Am Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers erhält er temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} entsprechend der Menge des vom Träger in dieser Runde verursachten Kollisionsschadens.

languages.text: À la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur bénéficie d'un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires égal au nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de collision qu'il a infligés au cours du tour.
languages.original_text: At the end of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the amount of collision {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} inflicted by the wearer this turn.

traits.locale_text: À la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur bénéficie d'un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires égal au nombre de points de dégâts de collision qu'il a infligés au cours du tour.
